channel.title: Programming on Seeds from the Apple of Discord
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Seeds from the Apple of Discord

item.title: The Idea of the Unix Programming Environment
item.description: Ever heard of the Unix principle? There are several actually, but the most well-known is the concept of “do one thing and do it well”.

item.title: Dependency Injection Considered ~~Harmful~~ Stupid - Part 2
item.description: After messing around with dependency injection frameworks in the first part, let’s see how we can take our LotR example and unclutter it by using data-oriented functional programming in Elixir!

item.title: The Rusty Nuts and Bolts
item.description: Lately I’ve been messing around with the Rust programming language. Here’s to the why, how and what.

item.title: Dependency Injection Considered ~~Harmful~~ Stupid
item.description: Ever used a dependency injection framework? Yes? In an object oriented language?

item.title: Introducing 'to entice so.'
item.description: Despite the misleading title of this - it could as well be a social engineering guide - I’m going to introduce a free, libre and open-source software project that I’m in charge of.
